word_mean: 搏动：有规律的跳动，如心跳

sentence.Network_en: Hues of purplish, rose and amber begin to pulsate in the sky.
sentence.Network_cn: 淡紫色的 、 玫瑰色的和琥珀色的色调开始在天空中微微颤动起来.

sentence.Network_en: When ABS is activated, the driver feels the brake pedal pulsate gently.
sentence.Network_cn: 当激活abs系统时, 驾驶员踩制动踏板有轻微的脉动的感觉.

sentence.Network_en: Building facades pulsate with millions of lights and glowing neon display.
sentence.Network_cn: 在千万灯光和霓虹灯的照耀下,建筑物的外墙规律地闪动着.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语构词法记忆单词研究 ... propel 推动,驱策 pulsate 悸动,跳动 pulse 跳动.
GRE逆序_馆档网 ... sate 使心满意足，使厌足 pulsate 有规律的振动 compensate 补偿，赔偿.
pulsarsignal 脉冲星, pulsate 异位搏动, pulsartimescale 脉冲星时

list.abs: pulsating magnetizing force 脉动磁化力pulsating quantity 脉动量pulsating rectified current 脉动整羚流
pulsating star 脉动星pulsating stress 脉动应力; 循环应力-
1. 脉动直流电pulsating current 脉动电流，脉动气流pulsation 脉动
pulsating rectified current 脉动整羚流pulsating voltage 脉动电压pulsation 脉动;交羚的角频率

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 18th cent.: from Latin pulsat- 'throbbed, pulsed', from the verb pulsare, frequentative of pellere 'to drive, beat'

entry.def: If something pulsates, it beats, moves in and out, or shakes with strong, regular movements.

means.word_mean: 1. expand and contract rhythmically; beat rhythmically;

sentences.sentence: "The baby's heart was pulsating again after the surgeon massaged it"

means.word_mean: 2. move with or as if with a regular alternating motion;

sentences.sentence: "the city pulsated with music and excitement"

means.word_mean: 3. produce or modulate (as electromagnetic waves) in the form of short bursts or pulses or cause an apparatus to produce pulses;

sentences.sentence: "a transmitter pulsed by an electronic tube"

stems_affixes.value_cn: 必须做的,强制性的,[课程]必修的
stems_affixes.word_buile: com共同+puls驱动,推+ory……的→共同推的→强制性的
impulse[v.冲动]+ive……的→adj.易冲动的,感情用事的
repulse[n.&v.驱逐,击退,厌恶]+ive……的→adj.令人厌恶的,驱逐的
com共同+puls驱动,推+ion表名词→共同推→强制
ex出+puls驱动,推+ion表名词→推出去→驱逐
pro向前+puls驱动,推+ion表名词→向前推
re回+puls驱动,推+e→推回去→击退,驱逐
pulse[n.脉搏,脉冲]+ate表动词→v.有规律的振动,[脉]搏动
